Title: Nothing’s new CMF smartwatch drops swappable bezels for a bigger display
Description:

Description:

Title: How to Build a Functional Smart Home When You’ll Never Own a House Yourself
Description: You might not ever become a homeowner, but that doesn't mean you can't make your not-a-house as smart as possible.

Title: Kemi Badenoch to reshuffle Tory shadow cabinet
Description: The leader of the opposition is expected to bring Sir James Cleverly back to a frontbench role.

Title: Ukraine and Russia set for fresh peace talks, Zelensky says
Description: Renewed efforts for a ceasefire come after the US pledged fresh military aid for Kyiv.

Title: Blairs' discount designer clothes caused concern, No 10 files show
Description: Officials worried the discounts would have to be declared and advised them to pay back thousands.

Title: Redmagic Astra is the OLED gaming tablet I've always wanted
Description: The Astra is a gaming tablet with a difference; it has a vibrant OLED panel and the latest internals, and the best part is that it costs just $499.

Title: 2 military bases expand to detain immigrants. And, Israel advances into central Gaza
Description:
Two U.S.
military bases are expanding to detain immigrants suspected of being in the country without legal status.
And, Israel has advanced into Central Gaza to put pressure on the ceasefire deal.

Title: Maryland state senator aims to change how juvenile offenders are treated in the state
Description:
In Maryland, more juveniles are tried as adults than in almost any other state.
State Sen.
William Smith is on a mission to change that.

Title: The Elvis Impersonator That Married 75 People a Day
Description: Each wedding is 15 minutes.

Title: Louisa May Alcott’s Utopian Feminist Workplace Novel
Description: In “Work: A Story of Experience,” Alcott fictionalizes her own stints as a servant, a seamstress, a governess, and a lady’s companion—and asks whether a wage counts as freedom for women.

Title: How to Firefox
Description:
Chrome finally pulled the trigger on the web’s best ad-blocker, uBlock Origin.
Now that Chrome has hobbled uBO, Firefox—my beloved—1 is surging again.
I want to do my part to convince you to switch to Firefox and show you how I use it.

Title: Male Birth Control Pill YCT-529 Passes Human Safety Test
Description: A hormone-free pill, called YCT-529, that temporarily stops sperm production by blocking a vitamin A metabolite has just concluded its first safety trial in humans, getting a step closer to increasing male contraceptive options

Title: Sam Altman needs 100 million AI GPUs worth $3 trillion for his vision — after OpenAI was forced to do "unnatural things"
Description: Sam Altman recently indicated that OpenAI is well on its way to bringing “well over 1 million GPUs online” by the end of this year, but needs 100 million total.

Title: Ubisoft blames gamers, Steam, trends, and everyone but itself for poor game sales
Description: In recent financial meetings and reports, Ubisoft has doubled down on blaming others for its shortcomings.

Title: NASA’s Roman telescope will catch 100,000 explosions — and rewrite the Universe’s story
Description:
NASA’s Roman Space Telescope is set to embark on a deep-sky survey that could capture nearly 100,000 cosmic explosions, shedding light on everything from dark energy to black hole physics.
